aboutPage.section1.title: About
aboutPage.section1.subtitle: Who are we?
aboutPage.section2.title: OUR HISTORY
aboutPage.section2.subtitle3: We are a company that was started by freelancer and senior consultants passionate about software development and with employees trained in different technologies used today, both for the field of mobile devices to desktop applications, with several years of experience and willing to accept any project.
aboutPage.section3.title: What we offer?
aboutPage.section3.subtitle: These are some of the rules that our company abides by:
aboutPage.section3.card1.title: Commitment
aboutPage.section3.card1.subtitle: We perfectly understand what lack of commitment is, because many of ours customers background is from companies that left their project behind, that's the reason why we commit to what we say taking into account budget and time.
aboutPage.section3.card2.title: Innovation
aboutPage.section3.card2.subtitle: Since we love technology, we never stop updating our skillsets, for each project we look for the best possible solution, this turns out in a benifict for our own growth and our customers, making us the best option.
aboutPage.section3.card3.title: From A to Z
aboutPage.section3.card3.subtitle: Our knowledge in different stacks of technology, allows us to offer consultancy in different areas of the lifecycle of a project, from brain storming to resuming and ending
servicePage.section1.title: Our services list
servicePage.section1.subtitle: we exceed in success
servicePage.section2.title: Some of our skills
servicePage.section2.subtitle: Our skillset is sweetly refined to be able to achieve ours goals and we can adapt to achieve yours
servicePage.section2.card1.title: Mobile development
servicePage.section2.card1.subtitle: From native development using Java/Kotlin to iOS native develompent using Swift to Cross platform solutions using Flutter
servicePage.section2.card2.title: Web Development

servicePage.section2.card3.title: Cloud computing
servicePage.section2.card3.subtitle: Do your project needs a migration to the cloud? we can help you on that
servicePage.section3.title: Do you have an idea, but you can't portrait it into an action?
servicePage.section3.subtitle: That's the reason why we exist, leave all the heavy lifting to us!
servicePage.section4.title: Planning & Designing
servicePage.section4.subtitle: We can help modeling ideas into actual projects, our professionals we'll guide you and your project to the best possible result
servicePage.section5.title: Development
servicePage.section5.subtitle: We use the latest and the best software development methodologies in order to ensure you get what you asked and yes we are talking about Scrum and Agile methodologies, in which we meet every 2 weeks to present the results you were waiting for.
servicePage.section6.title: Finished Result
servicePage.section6.subtitle: We love hearing from our customers, and we love good results, and good results are always best accompanied with software tools, to improve scalability over time such as CD/CI and yes the DevOps that our brand represents also stands out for something.
